New York City is sinking at a rate of a half-foot per century.
A new study released last Wednesday by a NASA-led research team used high-resolution satellite images to analyze the ground elevation o… [+4142 chars]

articles.author: Emmett Smith
articles.title: James Webb Telescope captures stunning images of a neighboring galaxy - Mashable
articles.description: Barnard’s Galaxy is roughly 1.5 million light-years away

articles.title: NASA Internship Programs - NASA
articles.description: NASA offers paid internships that provide an opportunity for high school and college-level students to contribute to agency projects.
